participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and hardworking, Emily is focused on her goals and enjoys the simplicity of life. She is friendly but can be reserved.
participant_1.background: i help tend the fields. i like to listen to rock music while working. i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Mark enjoys outdoor activities and values family. He has a laid-back attitude but is dedicated to his responsibilities.
participant_2.background: my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. my grandfather served in world war a.

content.text: Hi, how are doing?
Fine, and you?
that is a shame . but you have a positive attitude !
Huh?
i'm good getting ready to go to work at th bank
Hey, are you here? What's up?
And i am in the army.
hello . i'm getting ready for a hike . what are you up to today ?
Hey, are you here? What's up?
Training, more training, some training. Usual stuff.
doing good , just made a pizza for lunch , yum ! any plans today ?
Training, more training, some more training. Usual stuff.
what are you training for ?
Hey, are you here? What's up?
Pizza is nice. I like shawerma more though. I really miss good food here.
what are you training for ?
Hey, are you here? What's up?
Army things. I think i overestimated myself
awesome ! i have three kids and am trying to get pregnant again , so i cannot go .
Hey, are you here? What's up?
Wow, it sounds really great. I want to have big family too. I really loved my grandfather and he had a lot of children. It is nice
awesome ! i have three kids and am trying to get pregnant again , so i cannot go .
Hey, are you here? What's up?
Just a bit busy... what are you doing?
awesome ! i have three kids and am trying to get pregnant again , so i cannot go .
